description: This is a Kotlin source file defining the main UI screen for an Expense Tracker application using Jetpack Compose. It contains composable functions for the main screen layout, transaction form, summary cards, and transaction list, along with utility functions for navigation and data formatting.

classes.name: FormState
classes.description: Data class holding the state of the transaction form, including input fields and editing state.

methods.name: ExpenseTrackerScreen
methods.description: Main composable function defining the expense tracker UI, including header, summary, form, transaction list, and navigation.

methods.name: MonthHeader
methods.description: Displays the current month with navigation buttons for previous and next months.

methods.name: SummaryCards
methods.description: Displays summary cards for income, expense, and balance.

methods.name: SummaryCard
methods.description: Helper composable to display individual summary card.

methods.name: TransactionForm
methods.description: Form for adding or editing a transaction, including input validation.

methods.name: TransactionList
methods.description: Displays list of transactions with options to edit or delete.

methods.name: hexToColor
methods.description: Converts a hex color string to a Color object.
